Uses of Class
Assignment3.Board

    • Uses of Board in Assignment3

      Constructors in Assignment3 with parameters of type Board 
      Constructor and Description
      Knight(Board board)
      Create a Knight object and set its position to start at the top left of the board, which is indexes [0][0].
      Tour(Board board, Knight knight)
      Creates a new Tour that the Knight will be doing.
